name.description: Name of the channel. This is a one-line human-readable description of the channel

description.description: Description of the channel. This is a multi-lines human-readable description of the channel

support.description: Support level provided by the vendor

requires.description: Channels that are required by this channel.

channel.description: Maven coordinates (groupId:artifactId or groupId:artifactId:version) of the channel

streams.description: Streams of components that are provided by this channel

groupId.description: GroupId of the stream. It must be either a valid groupId (corresponding to a G of a Maven GAV) or the * character to represent any groupId

artifactId.description: ArtifactId of the stream. It must be either a valid artifactId (corresponding to a A of a Maven GAV) or the * character to represent any artifactId

version.description: Version of the stream. This must be either a single version. Only one of version, versionPattern must be set.

versionPattern.description: VersionPattern of the stream. This is a regular expression that matches any version from this stream. Only one of version, versionPattern must be set.
